name: lushly
content:
lushly adverb
(PLANTS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to say that plants are growing thickly and in a very healthy way: The offshore islands are lushly forested. The greenhouse sits in a corner of the lushly landscaped garden.
More examplesFewer examplesWe made our way along the lushly overgrown trail.The vineyard is perched up on a lushly landscaped hill.The site occupies a series of hills lushly carpeted with grass.

lushly adverb
(ATTRACTIVELY)
in a way that is very attractive to look at, taste, smell, etc.: His writing is lushly evocative of Greece. The film is lushly photographed. See
lush
